content: Hi, if I do a restful search operation and an error occurs, should the OperationOutcome that is returned be wrapped in a bundle (for consistency with result returned from a successful search), or should I just get an unwrapped OperationOutcome back? I've read through the relevant parts of the spec but it seems ambiguous on this point?
If the operation fails entirely, you return just an OperationOutcome. If it succeeds, you may get back a Bundle that may have an OperationOutcome that conveys warnings.
Brilliant - thanks. I suspected that might be the case but it wasn't explicit in the spec.
